trans-unit.resname: MH2·491 | Sanctum Prelate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a number.\nNoncreature spells with mana value equal to the chosen number can't be cast.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一个数字。 不能施放法术力值等同于该数字的非生物咒语。

trans-unit.source: "This area is off-limits to you."
trans-unit.target: 「禁地莫入。」
